extension.valueString: HL7 US Realm Program Management Author

name: CVXVaccinesAdministeredCompleteSet
title: CVX Vaccines Administered Complete Set
publisher: HL7 US Realm Program Management Steward
description: CVX Vaccine Status is an indication of the current availability of the vaccine for use
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Code representing a vaccine administered, history of a vaccine administered, a vaccine  intended to be administered to a patient),(Data Element Scope: Drug administration, drug order),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes with the following CVX "Vaccine Status" values: "Active", "Pending", "Inactive", EXCEPT those codes included in the Exclusion Criteria. This includes code 998 "no vaccine administered"),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes with the CVX "Vaccine Status" value = "Never Active". Code "99" and code "999" (both have Vaccine status = "Inactive"))
